scope.title: Fixed Plugin
scope.description: Fixed button that opens the main configurator for the Purity UI Dashboard

frontMatter.excerpt: Can be found inside src/components/FixedPlugin/FixedPlugin.js. This component
frontMatter.mdxContent:
---
title: Fixed Plugin
package: "@chakra-ui/layout"
image: "components/box.svg"
description:
  Fixed button that opens the main configurator for the Purity UI Dashboard
---

Can be found inside `src/components/FixedPlugin/FixedPlugin.js`. This component
is the right menu and its purpose is so you can easily customize the left menu
and also change the Chakra color mode. It is only rendered inside the
`src/layouts/Admin.js` and `src/layouts/RTL.js` layouts.
frontMatter.title: Fixed Plugin
frontMatter.description: Fixed button that opens the main configurator for the Purity UI Dashboard
